desc: Tantalus Labs is leading Sungrown, BC cannabis. We created SunLab¹, a facility using natural inputs like full-spectrum sunlight and recaptured rainwater to grow elite cannabis products. We cultivate strains that are high THC, Balanced, and high CBD for the discerning cannabis connoisseur.

layout.text: Blood Orange is a sativa leaning hybrid, bred from a cross of AE77 Cali Orange and Appalachia. The Blood Orange Tee is available in white with a relaxed fit. Gildan oversized t-shirt, featuring a uniquely soft premium 100% heavy cotton fabric, with a crew neck and short sleeves.
